mapper.select: select p.pdnum as pdnum, ps.prc, pl.plocation as plocation , substr(p.atclfetrdesc,1,8) as atclfetrdesc, ps.tradtpcd, pi.pdescription as tradtpcd, p.spc1, p.spc2 from product p, product_sale_info ps, product_location pl , product_info pi where p.pdnum= pl.pdnum and p.pdnum = ps.pdnum and p.pdnum = pi.pdnum and p.rlettpcd='D02' and pl.plocation = #{location} order by ps.prc

select p.pdnum, ps.prc as prc, pl.plocation as plocation, p.atclfetrdesc as atclfetrdesc, ps.tradtpcd as tradtpcd, pi.pdescription , p.spc1, p.spc2 from product p, product_sale_info ps, product_location pl, product_info pi where p.pdnum= pl.pdnum and p.pdnum = ps.pdnum and p.pdnum = pi.pdnum and p.pdnum = #{pdnum} order by ps.prc

select p.pdnum , p.rlettpcd, ps.tradtpcd as tradtpcd, p.atclfetrdesc, p.taglist, p.rltrnm, ps.prc, pl.plocation, pi.pdescription as plocation from product p, product_sale_info ps, product_location pl , product_info pi where p.pdnum= pl.pdnum and p.pdnum = ps.pdnum and p.pdnum = pi.pdnum
mapper.delete: delete option_sel where pidnum in(select pidnum from product_info where pdnum=#{pdnum})
delete administrative where pidnum in(select pidnum from product_info where pdnum=#{pdnum})
mapper.update: update product_info set pmove = #{pmove} , pdescription =#{pdescription} where pdnum = #{pdnum}
update product_sale_info set tradtpcd = #{tradtpcd} , prc = #{sale} where pdnum= #{pdnum}
update option_sel set poption = #{option} where pidnum in(select pidnum from product_info where pdnum=#{pdnum})
